name: Where's AI
description:
You are a private Investigator looking for someone in a world full of identical looking someones... Might be hard to find but you will never give up! 

General idea based on the Where's Wally? books by Martin Handford .

I wanted to play around with Artificial Intelligence so i made a game all about find little AI agents where you move another AI around to find clues, informers and ultimately your target!

Made with unity, around 3 weeks of solo development.

Music from the Youtube Studio Library
